page.title: 20Changing Face of Glanaman.
page.content:
Changes have taken, and are taking place in the Glanaman area. Coal mining is no longer a major source of employment for the local people. Unemployment is now a major concern, with 50% of all workers unemployed. Tracts of local farmland have been altered by opencast mining; hedges having been uprooted and waste material deposited in the topsoil. Therefore, although Glanaman no longer depends economically on the coal industry, the consequences of its development will remain with the area for some time to come.
